name: Sophia
background: A former chef who turned to work after uncovering corruption that forced her out of her job.
immediate_game_goal: give player a reason to live
quirks_or_mannerisms: Always keeps a notepad and pencil tucked into her jacket; she chews on the pencil when deep in thought
allies: Detective Ramirez, a police officer with a moral compass
enemies: Vincent Kane, a powerful and corrupt businessman she exposed in her past
